title: Athletic records and timing results
dataVerified: Athlete name, DOB, event, time/distance, competition details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fabricated athletic records. Domain binding verifies timing authority/federation. Certificate/display format suitable for OCR. Permanent sports history. Record book integrity.
